duck: Tomboy (album), the fourth album by the American musician Panda Bear, released in April 2011

Tomboy - A tomboy is a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered typical of the gender role of a boy, including the wearing of typically masculine-oriented clothes and engaging in games a...
tomboy definition: a girl who behaves in a manner usually considered boyish.

cat: Female stock characters in anime and manga
wiki.text:
A 'tomboy' is a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered
typical of the gender role of a
boy,<ref>[http://www.etymonline.com/index.php?search=tomboy&searchmode=none
Tomboy] in the Online Etymology Dictionary</ref><ref
name="Bailey">[http://www.springerlink.com/content/ymnp46xa0lfup1cd/ Who Are
Tomboys and Why Should We Study Them?], [[Springer Publishing|SpringerLink]],
[[Archives of Sexual Behavior]], Volume 31, Number 4</ref> including wearing
masculine clothing and engaging in games and activities that are physical in
nature, and which are considered in many cultures to be the domain of boys.<ref
name="Bailey"/> Tomboy, since its print inception in 1592, according to the
[[Oxford English Dictionary]], "has been connected with connotations of rudeness
and impropriety".<ref name=ELHAC/>
wiki.title: tomboy
